name: best-life
description:
# Project Description -A fitness application to show the users daily calorie intake and log food eaten and weight lost/gained Since there can be many functionality that can be added, we are going to focus on mvp using the moscow method.
-Mvp- the ability for users to sign in and log their daily calorie intake every time they eat or exercise and to see their progress.
-Pmvp- individual users can add certain foods to the database so other users donâ€™t have to find out what foods have certain amount of calories
